name: Cheesy Chicken Bacon Cabbage Casserole
ingredients: 1 green or red bell pepper, chopped
4 cups diced cooked chicken breast, 18 ounces
utensils: Very large Dutch oven or wok

instructions.en: Fry bacon until crisp; remove to paper towel-lined plate. Reserve 2 tablespoons grease if desired.
Sauté cabbage, onions and bell peppers in butter or bacon grease until tender and wilted; season with salt and pepper.
Stir in chicken, sour cream, bacon and 8 ounces of cheese. Adjust seasoning.
Spread mixture in greased 9x13" baking pan. Top with 4 ounces of cheese and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake at 450º until golden brown and bubbly, about 20 minutes.
Let stand about 10 minutes before serving.

notes: Makes about 8 servings. Do not freeze. A cup of sour cream is used rather than 8 ounces by weight.
